verses.verse: וַיִּסַּ֤ע <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-Sa' took his journey יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֔וֹ lo, וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo with all that he had and came בְּאֵ֣רָה be-'E-rah שָּׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> Sha-va'; to Beersheba וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> vai-yiz-Bach and offered זְבָחִ֔ים <S%H2077><s%> ze-va-Chim, sacrifices לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei unto the God אָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv of his father יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak. Isaac

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel בְּמַרְאֹ֣ת <S%H4759><s%> be-mar-'Ot in the visions הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, of the night וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said יַעֲקֹ֣ב׀ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; Jacob וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I הָאֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> ha-'El I [am] God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha; of thy father אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra fear מֵרְדָ֣ה <S%H3381><s%> me-re-Dah not to go down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah, into Egypt כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol of thee a great אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֥ <S%H7760><s%> 'a-si-me-Cha for I will there make שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi, I אֵרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> 'e-Red I will go down עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha you מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah, with thee into Egypt וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I אַֽעַלְךָ֣ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-'al-Cha and I will also surely גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- will also עָלֹ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Loh; bring thee up וְיוֹסֵ֕ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef [again] and Joseph יָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> ya-Shit shall put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha. upon thine eyes

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom rose up יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר mib-be-'Er שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> Sha-va'; from Beersheba וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U carried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- and the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, their father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et טַפָּם֙ <S%H2945><s%> tap-Pam and their little ones וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> ne-shei-Hem, and their wives בָּעֲגָל֕וֹת <S%H5699><s%> ba-'a-ga-Lot in the wagons אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach had sent פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh which Pharaoh לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> la-Set to carry אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4735><s%> mik-nei-Hem, their cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רְכוּשָׁם֙ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-Sham and their goods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָֽכְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7408><s%> ra-che-Shu which they had gotten בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all זַרְע֥וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O and all his seed אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> it-To. for

בָּנָ֞יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav His sons וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and his sons' בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav sons אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for בְּנֹתָ֛יו <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tav with him his daughters וּבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-Not daughters בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav and his sons' וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O; and all his seed הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> he-Vi brought he אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah. with him into Egypt ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these שְׁמ֧וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הַבָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im which came מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וּבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav; and his sons בְּכֹ֥ר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor firstborn יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob's רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven. Reuben

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven; of Reuben חֲנ֥וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> cha-Noch Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <S%H6396><s%> u-fal-Lu and Phallu וְחֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> ve-chetz-Ron and Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3756><s%> ve-char-Mi. and Carmi

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֧ל <S%H3223><s%> ye-mu-'El Jemuel וְיָמִ֛ין <S%H3226><s%> ve-ya-Min and Jamin וְאֹ֖הַד <S%H161><s%> ve-'O-had and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <S%H3199><s%> ve-ya-Chin and Jachin וְצֹ֑חַר <S%H6714><s%> ve-Tzo-char; and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul and Shaul בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽית׃ <S%H3669><s%> Hak-ke-na-'a-Nit. of a Canaanitish

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi; of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <S%H1648><s%> ge-re-Shon Gershon קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> u-me-ra-Ri. and Merari

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עֵ֧ר <S%H6147><s%> 'er Er וְאוֹנָ֛ן <S%H209><s%> ve-'o-Nan and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֖ה <S%H7956><s%> ve-she-Lah and Shelah וָפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> va-Fe-retz and Pharez וָזָ֑רַח <S%H2226><s%> va-Za-rach; and Zerah וַיָּ֨מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died עֵ֤ר <S%H6147><s%> 'er but Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <S%H209><s%> ve-'o-Nan and Onan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the sons פֶ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Fe-retz of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron were Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <S%H2538><s%> ve-cha-Mul. and Hamul

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> yi-so-sh-Char; of Issachar תּוֹלָ֥ע <S%H8439><s%> to-La' Tola וּפֻוָּ֖ה <S%H6312><s%> u-fuv-Vah and Phuvah וְי֥וֹב <S%H3102><s%> ve-Yov and Job וְשִׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8110><s%> ve-shim-Ron. and Shimron

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons זְבוּלֻ֑ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun; of Zebulun סֶ֥רֶד <S%H5624><s%> Se-red Sered וְאֵל֖וֹן <S%H356><s%> ve-'e-Lon and Elon וְיַחְלְאֵֽל׃ <S%H3177><s%> ve-yach-le-'El. and Jahleel

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These [be] the sons לֵאָ֗ה <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah, of Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יָֽלְדָ֤ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah which she bare לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko unto Jacob בְּפַדַּ֣ן be-fad-Dan אֲרָ֔ם <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram, in Padanaram וְאֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et for דִּינָ֣ה <S%H1783><s%> di-Nah Dinah בִתּ֑וֹ <S%H1323><s%> vit-To; with his daughter כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נֶ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh all the souls בָּנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav of his sons וּבְנוֹתָ֖יו <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tav and his daughters שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim [were] thirty וְשָׁלֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Losh. and three

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad, of Gad צִפְי֥וֹן <S%H6837><s%> tzif-Yon Ziphion וְחַגִּ֖י <S%H2291><s%> ve-chag-Gi and Haggi שׁוּנִ֣י <S%H7764><s%> shu-Ni Shuni וְאֶצְבֹּ֑ן <S%H675><s%> ve-'etz-Bon; and Ezbon עֵרִ֥י <S%H6179><s%> 'e-Ri Eri וַֽאֲרוֹדִ֖י <S%H722><s%> va-'a-ro-Di and Arodi וְאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H692><s%> ve-'ar-'e-Li. and Areli
